attributes.action: Make a Statue for Bradford Jesus Man!
attributes.background:
He was loved by all in Yorkshire!

He deserves a statue in memory of him!

rejection.details:
This seems to be a decision for the local council to make, rather than the UK Government or Parliament. 

City of Bradford Metropolitan District Council has its own e-petitions site:

http://epetition.bradford.public-i.tv/epetition_core/

Alternatively, you can use the following link to find out who your local councillors are:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
